content: coffee time cozy free crochet wall hanging pattern add a touch of warmth and whimsy to your space with the coffee time cozy wall hanging this delightful crochet pattern features charming appliqués of coffee cups a heart-shaped cookie a cinnamon roll a donut and the phrase coffee time spelled out in bold letters perfect for coffee enthusiasts and crafters alike this project brings a cozy café vibe right into your home pattern highlights skill level confident beginner to intermediate craft crochet category decorative → wall hanging language english format written instructions with clear assembly guidelines availability free download finished dimensions approximately 13 5 inches 34 3 cm long by 12 inches 30 5 cm wide materials needed worsted weight yarn in various colors approx 258 yards total us g6 4 00 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors optional pins and stitch markers key features modular design with individual appliqués for customization includes instructions for an optional background panel suitable for various color schemes to match your decor ideal for gifting or adding a handmade touch to your kitchen or coffee nook stay connected join our creative community and share your finished projects tag your creations @starrywhisperweaves on social media we love seeing your interpretations and color choices i will also have a video tutorial series available on my tiktok support the designer while this pattern is available for free your support is greatly appreciated consider leaving a review sharing the pattern with fellow crafters or exploring other designs in my etsy shop your encouragement keeps the creativity flowing
